title: Johnstown Flood National Memorial: A.C. Crawford
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People     A.C. Crawford                A.C. Crawford (?-?)       At this time, not much is known about South Fork Fishing & Hunting Club member A.C. Crawford. There are some researchers who believe that the "A" may actually be a typographical error, and in reality it should be R.C. Crawford. Until more definitive information is gathered, we will stick with A.C. Crawford. There was an A.C. Crawford who was an attorney from Armstrong County. This page will be updated with more information once it is discovered. and verified.
